item.title: BuzzFeed Studios Film ‘Adulting’ Accused of Firing Workers Over Union Organizing
item.description: An independent film shooting in Alabama has been accused of retaliating against crew members for union activity as they tried to organize the production. “Adulting,” which stars Leighton M
